title: Soul Glo Font
content:
Does anybody know what font 'Soul Glo' from Coming to America is?

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktl6L3ZwvL4](http://web.archive.org/web/20110608161835/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktl6L3ZwvL4)
author: afbase

comments.content: Why yes I think so. I think its amazing that a site with this group of users exists. Thanks.

In the clip it seems to be tweaked so the letters join though.

Welcome to Typophile.
